description:
Misaki has a surprise opponent in the second round of the National Games.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Freund oder Feind? Die zwei Gesichter von Onkelchen Icchan
Icchan est-il un ennemi ? Un jeu étrange.
Icchan É O Meu Oponente?! O Confuso Segundo Round!
Teki wa Icchan? Tomadoi no Nikai Sen!
The Enemy is Icchan? The Stuttering Second Match
敵はいっちゃん? 戸惑いの二回戦!
